Package monsters

Class Raka

java.lang.Object
main.Monster
monsters.Raka
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
public class Raka extends Monster
A monster subclass. An ancient being from decades ago, Raka swaps between a healer and an attacker. Its offensive ability can be overlooked but not its healing ability. With this monster in the team, monsters will definitely get a substantial boost!
Author:
Farzad and Daniel
